name: getUserLevelChannel
description:
Zoom chat [channels](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/200912909-Getting-Started-With-Channels-Group-Messaging-) allow users to communicate via chat in private or public groups. Use this API to get information about a specific channel. **Scope:** `chat_channel:read`
**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `Medium`

Note: This API only supports user-managed OAuth app.

channelId.description: Channel ID: Unique Identifier of a channel.

$block: The channel object represents a Zoom chat [channel](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/200912909-Getting-Started-With-Channels-Group-Messaging-).

$ul: **type**: Type of the channel. The value can be one of the following:
